      • restartSipStack

        public void restartSipStack()
                     throws SameThreadException
        抛出:
        SameThreadException

      • stopSipStack

        public boolean stopSipStack()
                     throws SameThreadException
        Safe stop the sip stack
        返回:
        true if can be stopped, false if there is a pending call and the sip service should not be stopped
        抛出:
        SameThreadException

      • isConnectivityValid

        public boolean isConnectivityValid()

                                      int renew,

                               throws SameThreadException
        抛出:
        SameThreadException

      • shouldAutoAnswer

        public int shouldAutoAnswer(java.lang.String remContact,
                            SipProfile acc,
                            Bundle extraHdr)
        Should a current incoming call be answered. A call to this method will reset internal state
        参数:
        remContact - The remote contact to test
        acc - The incoming guessed account
        返回:
        the sip code to auto-answer with. If > 0 it means that an auto answer must be fired

      • notifyUserOfMessage

        public void notifyUserOfMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        Notify user from a message the sip stack wants to transmit. For now it shows a toaster
        参数:
        msg - String message to display

      • notifyUserOfMessage

        public void notifyUserOfMessage(int resStringId)
        Notify user from a message the sip stack wants to transmit. For now it shows a toaster
        参数:
        resStringId - The id of the string resource to display

        public void confAdjustTxLevel(float speakVolume)
                       throws SameThreadException
        Adjust tx software sound level
        参数:
        speakVolume - volume 0.0 - 1.0
        抛出:
        SameThreadException
